1.title: Bikinis, Pirates, and Pura Vida
1.plot: We're bikini rappelling down a massive 180-foot waterfall in the jungle, and enjoying the best bodies and surf breaks in Jaco, Costa Rica. Then it's off to Tybee Island, Georgia where we get our grog on at the famous Pirate Fest.

2.title: Bikinis and Barbecue in Galveston, Texas
2.plot: We're surfing with dolphins behind epic oil tankers, crushing worldclass barbecue on Galveston Island, Texas. Then it's off to San Juan, Puerto Rico for insane local cuisine, Caribbean waters, and bikini clad beach tennis players.

5.title: Bikinis in Mykonos, Greece and Chicago, Illinois
5.plot: We're hitting the Chicago Air & Water Show, with super-sonic jets, hot bodies, and legendary good times. Then it's off to Mykonos, Greece to chill like the Gods, devour authentic, local eats, and enjoy some bikini horseback riding.

2.title: Surfer Girls
2.plot: Surfing safari with bikini clad girls.

3.title: West vs. East
3.plot: The artists' mecca and the nation's summer capital.

4.title: Bikini Contest
4.plot: First stop, the ultimate summer party, Virginia Beach, VA, for extreme BMX, championship surfing, and a coveted bikini battle.

6.title: Top Ten Summer Chowdown
6.plot: Find out the Top 10 popular food at the hottest beaches and boardwalks.

1.title: Brazilian and Bondi Beauties
1.plot: First, it's the golden Bondi Beach, Australia, where bikini beauties and adrenaline junkies find their paradise. Then, it's off to gorgeous Florianopolis, Brazil, for sand boarding down dunes and feasting on traditional barbecue.

2.title: Bikinis, Surf, & Sun
2.plot: First stop, the North Shore of Oahu, Hawaii. Then, it's off to the Mexican island oasis of Cozumel to indulge in world-class snorkeling and succulent lobster!

3.title: Bikinis & Body Shots
3.plot: First up, Cabo San Lucas, Mexico for the world's richest fishing event and finger licking fish tacos. Then hold on, as we race across Florida's Clearwater Beach at 200mph in their annual speed boat competition.

4.title: Bikinis Down Under
4.plot: A thrill seekers playground, Australia's Surfers Paradise. Climb to the highest point on the beach, then drop into Australia's most hidden swimming hole. Then jet over to Hoi An, Vietnam for the ultimate beachside markets

5.title: Bikinis & BASE Jumping
5.plot: First up, venture off the beaten path to Railay Beach, Thailand. Then it's off to Orange County, California.

6.title: Girls of the Gulf
6.plot: It's off to the ultimate old-county pleasure zone, Alabama's Gulf Coast, where shrimping is a way of life. From zip-line courses to Alabama steaks. Here, work and play happens right on the beach.

7.title: Brazilian Beach Blowout
7.plot: First up, the sizzling hot beaches of Rio de Janiero, Brazil. Then, head to the gorgeous, white sand South Beach for the ultimate luxury getaway complete.

8.title: Bikini Shark Dive
8.plot: First up, surf the iconic waves of Waikiki. Then, head to Boracay, Philippines for a wild adventure.

9.title: Bikinis and Mud Baths
9.plot: We're hitting the Chicago Air & Water Show, with super-sonic jets, hot bodies, and legendary good times. Then it's off to Mykonos, Greece to chill like the Gods, devour authentic, local eats, and enjoy some bikini horseback riding.

locations: Coney Island, Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: Nothing says vacation like a beach boardwalk, where millions of travelers flock to indulge in their favorite guilty pleasures every year. Specialty cameras will be mounted on everything, from surfers braving the waves to the helmets of active Army Parachute Specialists, as they rain down from over 12,000 feet above the boardwalk at the annual Atlantic City Air Show. We'll go behind the scenes and meet the world famous candy makers as they go through 10,000 pounds of taffy a day trying to satisfy tourists' insatiable sweet tooth! And just when you think you've seen it all, viewers will get an insider entrée to the country's last Circus Sideshow at Coney Island's Boardwalk - with never-before-given access to the sword swallowers, sorcerers, fire-eaters and more! From the sinfully delicious foods and adrenaline-pumping thrill rides, to the unexpected nearby attractions and miles of gorgeous beach - this will be an all-access pass to summer's most sizzling destinations, and the inside scoop on what makes these playgrounds the ultimate summer hotspots.
